tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
  user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR,
  preferences JSON
)

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    user_id INT,
    preference_1 VARCHAR(255),
    preference_2 VARCHAR(255),
    preference_3 VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id)
);
CREATE TABLE user_profiles ( user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(100), age INT, gender VARCHAR(10) );
CREATE TABLE user_preferences ( preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, preference_name VARCHAR(50), preference_value VARCHAR(50), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id) );
CREATE TABLE ai_recommendations ( recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, recommendation_text TEXT, recommendation_date TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id) );
CREATE TABLE user_activities ( activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, activity_type VARCHAR(50), activity_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id) );

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
);
